com.lukflug.panelstudio.hud

Class HUDClickGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lukflug.panelstudio.ClickGUI
      • com.lukflug.panelstudio.hud.HUDClickGUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PanelManager, Toggleable

    public class HUDClickGUI
extends ClickGUI
implements Toggleable
    ClickGUI that only renders HUD components when closed.
